706406f-a.text:
Putnam Avenue, at Claver Place and Classon Avenue. View 1 shows nos. 103 to 111 Putnam Avenue, at Claver Place; view 2, the north side of the avenue, west from Classon Avenue.

P.L. Sparr
August 24,1941
706406f-a.folder: Putnam Avenue & Claver Place, Brooklyn, NY
